name: house (therealpia)
description: wasd to move, some doors wont work its fine i'll add it later, stay out of the water because i dont know how to add an animation for it, if something makes the game crash jsut reload the page and dont do whatever crashed the game again, if you encounter a bug its actualy a feature and its not my fault you cant understand my artistic genius. please do not enjoy, this game is not for enjoying.
